ORZ GTX ABX CI TIX-CIL NURSING INSTRUCTIONS
WordProcessing1: Nursing: ** REVISED Inv-Cilgavimab 300mg + Inv-Tixagevimab 300mg Administration Instructions (EVUSHELD)** Instructions:
WordProcessing2: 1) Give patient Fact Sheet for Patients/Caregivers for the medication.  2) Complete pre-screening questions template in CPRS for the medication.
WordProcessing3: 3) Pharmacy will dispense the medication in TWO original kits (each kit contains both medications in 2 separate vials) to the clinic labeled per patient.  4) Store medication/kit in refrigerator until patient appointment time.  5) Do NOT puncture vials until ready to administer to patient.
WordProcessing4: 6) The medications are given as TWO separate consecutive intramuscular injections.  7) Cilgavimab: Pull up 300mg/3ml TOTAL dose from two cilgavimab 150mg vials into a single syringe and attach needle for IM administration.(Note: overfill in vials) 8) Tixagevimab: Pull up 300mg/3ml TOTAL dose from two tixagevimab 150mg vials into a single syringe and attach needle for IM administration. 9) Administer the above two medications at different injection sites, preferably one in each of the gluteal muscles (buttocks), one after the other.  10)Observe patient for one hour post-injection--patient to remain in clinic.
